relation: Darrow - #90 Finally wearing the Franklin Badge, Ness counters Carpainter's attack. Unfortunately for Ness, Carpainter is starting to show him up in the "make scary faces" department.
Darrow - #89 Carpainter may not have the most interesting backstory, but wow, does he know how to dress. I'd harbor evil feelings, too, if my beanie was ruined.
Darrow - #88 Carpainter appears! Now if only there was someone willing to fund a sitcom with him and Giygas playing roommates.
Darrow - #87 A swift end comes to the giant cultist. Also, that desk guy is one of my favorite NPCs. He's an interesting fellow.
Darrow - #86 After a relaxing Kabuki Theater experience, Ness comes across a giant of an obstacle. Drink your milk and spend all day beating up Spiteful Crows and you, too, can grow this big, kids!
